TEXT.TITLE: ASCS SEEKS 12.5 MLN POUNDS VEG OIL FOR EXPORT
TEXT.BODY: The Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service (ASCS) is seeking 12.5 mln pounds of vegetable oil for export June 6-20 and June 21/July 5, an ASCS official said. Offers must be received at the Kansas City Commodity Office by 1430 CDT May 4, and successful offerors will be notified May 5. reuter
